languages.text: "... да благословит Император Ключ всех Судеб держащий Звездн{mf|ого|ую} Госпо{mf|дина|жу}, что с небес снизош{mf|ел|ла} на птице стальной..."

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] ... да благослови Император звёздного Лорда на железной птице....

languages.text: "...may the Emperor, He That Holdeth the Key to all Destinies, bless the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, {mf|him|her} who descended from the sky on a bird of steel..."
languages.original_text: "... да благословит Император Ключ всех Судеб держащий Звездн{mf|ого|ую} Госпо{mf|дина|жу}, что с небес снизош{mf|ел|ла} на птице стальной..."

languages.text: 「…すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの皇帝陛下よ、天より鋼の鳥に乗って舞い降りた天の{mf|君|姫}に、祝福を授け給わんことを…」
languages.original_text: "...may the Emperor, He That Holdeth the Key to all Destinies, bless the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, {mf|him|her} who descended from the sky on a bird of steel..."

traits.locale_text: 「…すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの皇帝陛下よ、天より鋼の鳥に乗って舞い降りた天の{mf|君|姫}に、祝福を授け給わんことを…」

languages.text: "Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı Elinde Tutan İmparator, çelikten bir kuşla gökten inen Semavi {mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} kutsasın..."
languages.original_text: "...may the Emperor, He That Holdeth the Key to all Destinies, bless the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, {mf|him|her} who descended from the sky on a bird of steel..."

traits.locale_text: "…Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı Elinde Tutan İmparator, Semavi {mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} kutsasın; o ki çelikten bir kuşla gökten indi…"

languages.text: «... que el Emperador, El que Porta la Llave de Todos los Destinos, bendiga a nuestr{mf|o Señor|a Señora} Celestial, {mf|aquel|aquella} que descendió de los cielos en un ave de acero...».
languages.original_text: "...may the Emperor, He That Holdeth the Key to all Destinies, bless the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, {mf|him|her} who descended from the sky on a bird of steel..."

traits.locale_text: «... que el Emperador, El que Porta la Llave de Todos los Destinos, bendiga a nuestr{mf|o Señor|a Señora} Celestial, {mf|aquel|aquella} que descendió de los cielos en un ave de acero...».

languages.text: “……愿伟大的帝皇，万千命运之钥的持有者，祝福来自上界的大人。那位大人乘着钢铁巨鸟，从天而降……”
languages.original_text: "...may the Emperor, He That Holdeth the Key to all Destinies, bless the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, {mf|him|her} who descended from the sky on a bird of steel..."

traits.locale_text: “……愿伟大的帝皇，万千命运之钥的持有者，祝福来自上界的大人。那位大人乘着钢铁巨鸟，从天而降……”

languages.text: « ... puisse l'Empereur, Celui qui détient la clé de tous les destins, bénir {mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste, {mf|descendu|descendue} du firmament sur les ailes d'un oiseau d'acier... »
languages.original_text: "...may the Emperor, He That Holdeth the Key to all Destinies, bless the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, {mf|him|her} who descended from the sky on a bird of steel..."

traits.locale_text: « ... puisse l'Empereur, Celui qui détient la clé de tous les destins, bénir {mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste, {mf|descendu|descendue} du firmament sur les ailes d'un oiseau d'acier... »

languages.text: "... möge der Imperator, Er, der über den Schlüssel aller Schicksale wacht, {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} segnen, {mf|der|die} in einem Vogel aus Stahl vom Himmel herabgestiegen ist ..."
languages.original_text: "...may the Emperor, He That Holdeth the Key to all Destinies, bless the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, {mf|him|her} who descended from the sky on a bird of steel..."
